post.author: evilartist
post.body:
You don't really need a mod for that. If you're looking for a quick work around, just use these console commands:

'pm_stamina x' - the length of time a player can run (default: 24)
'pm_staminarate x' - rate of stamina regeneration (default: 0.75)
'pm_staminathreshold x' - below this value, the player only walks (default: 45)

I know it's not the same as having an auto-run mod, but at least you can experiment and have a little fun.

post.author: Zombie13
post.body: If you use pm_stamina 0 it gives you unlimited stamina.
